nodes.text: Return of the Jedi Weekly 1 is the first issue of Return of the Jedi Weekly, the continuation of the Marvel Star Wars UK series. The series' previous title was Star Wars Monthly. For the first time in the UK series, the issue numbering was restarted when the title changed. According to an advertisement at the end of Star Wars Monthly 171, this issue was scheluded to be originally released on June 16.
This issue reprints part one of the story printed in the US as Return of the Jedi 1, along with part one of Star Wars 72.
